title: SftpConnection
description: SFTP Connection Config for secure file transfer protocol servers.

basicAuth.title: Username/Password Authentication
basicAuth.description: Username and password authentication for SFTP

keyAuth.title: Private Key Authentication
keyAuth.description: SSH private key authentication for SFTP

privateKey.title: Private Key
privateKey.description: SSH private key content in PEM format. Supports RSA, Ed25519, ECDSA, and DSS keys.

privateKeyPassphrase.title: Private Key Passphrase
privateKeyPassphrase.description: Passphrase for the private key (if encrypted)

host.title: Host
host.description: SFTP server hostname or IP address

authType.title: Authentication Type
authType.description: Authentication method: username/password or SSH private key

rootDirectories.title: Root Directories
rootDirectories.description: List of root directories to scan for files and subdirectories. If not specified, defaults to the user's home directory.

directoryFilterPattern.title: Directory Filter Pattern
directoryFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude directories that match the pattern.

fileFilterPattern.title: File Filter Pattern
fileFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude files that match the pattern.

structuredDataFilesOnly.title: Structured Data Files Only
structuredDataFilesOnly.description: When enabled, only catalog structured data files (CSV, TSV) that can have schema extracted. Non-structured files like images, PDFs, videos, etc. will be skipped.

extractSampleData.title: Extract Sample Data
extractSampleData.description: When enabled, extract sample data from structured files (CSV, TSV). This is disabled by default to avoid performance overhead.
